tidbits.title: Pink Sand Beaches
tidbits.description: Bermuda is famed for its stunning pink sand beaches, caused by the presence of crushed coral and calcium carbonate, creating a picturesque shoreline.

tidbits.title: Maritime History
tidbits.description: Bermuda has a rich maritime heritage, with shipwrecks dotting its waters, offering exceptional diving experiences and tales of naval history.

tidbits.title: Mysteries of the Bermuda Triangle
tidbits.description: The Bermuda Triangle, an area between Miami, Bermuda, and Puerto Rico, has been associated with mysterious disappearances of ships and aircraft, capturing global interest.
